Comment: Units: h056 (Khaz Modan Tower), Ubertip (Tooltip - Extended)
Value: Heavy defensive structure. Particularly effective against clusters of troops. Grants a 5% Command Aura. Requires Riflemen manning it in order to attack. Can learn the Magic Sentry ability. |n|cff99b4d1Can only build 6.|r|n|cffffcc00Attacks land units and trees.|r
